name: Elite Elementor Addons
author: Webnobby

sections.description:
Welcome to Elite Elementor Addons! Enhance your website effortlessly by integrating our pre-designed sections, saving valuable time and effort. With Elite Elementor Addons, unlock endless possibilities for creating stunning websites with ease.

Short Description

Enhance your website with Elite Elementor Addons pre-designed sections, saving you valuable time and effort.

Key Features

  • Access a diverse range of pre-designed sections.
  • Seamlessly integrate into the Elementor library.
  • Save time with our efficient website design solution.
  • Elevate your design effortlessly.

Source Code

The source code for the JavaScript library macy.js included in this plugin is available at macy.js Source Code.

Alternatively, find the source code directly within the plugin’s directory structure at elite-elementor-addons/assets/js/lib/macy/macy.js.

Usage

Once activated, Elite Elementor Addons seamlessly integrates with Elementor. Discover a wide range of new widgets and elements to enhance your designs.

Macy.js Library

This plugin includes the macy.js library, a lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript library for creating responsive grid layouts. The uncompressed source code of macy.js is provided within the plugin directory for easy review and modification by developers.

Find the macy.js source code at macy.js Source Code.

External Service Usage

Elite Elementor Addons utilizes an external service for specific functionalities, such as fetching images and data related to the plugin’s library.

  • Service: Elite Elements Addon Library
  • Terms of Use: Elite Elements Addon Library Terms of Use
  • Privacy Policy: Elite Elements Addon Library Privacy Policy
sections.installation:
Note: This plugin requires Elementor. Ensure you have Elementor installed.

  1. Install the plugin directly through the WordPress plugins screen or upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/elite-elementor-addons directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Access all settings in the Admin sidebar menu under ‘Elite Elements’.
  4. Browse and use pre-designed sections in the Elementor library.

For any inquiries, please visit our FAQ page or contact us via Premium Support.
sections.faq:
Does it work with any theme?

Yes, Elite Elements works with any theme compatible with Elementor.

Can I use Elite Elements on a wordpress.com site?

Since the plugin is hosted on wordpress.org, it’s available on wordpress.com too. However, you may need a business plan to install third-party plugins on wordpress.com.

Editor fails to load or not working?

This issue may stem from your server PHP settings. Increase your server PHP memory limit from the wp-config.php file or php.ini file. If you’re unsure, contact your hosting provider for assistance.

What Are the Recommended PHP Settings?

  • Minimum PHP version: 5.6
  • Memory limit: 256M or more
  • Post max size: 64M
